entries.name: Fierce
entries: A fierce weapon deals an extra {@dice 1d4} damage of the weapon's type to any target it hits.

entries.name: Unarmed
entries: Weapon attacks made with an unarmed weapon count as unarmed strikes.

baseitem.name: Knuckleduster
entries: This held weapon is a single piece of metal or stone with holes or a grip designed to be worn around the knuckles of a humanoid hand.

baseitem.name: Cestus
entries: A set of reinforced leather strips to be tightly bound around foot or hand, which protect the knuckles or foot and transforms mere punches or kicks into lethal blows.

baseitem.name: Spiked Cestus
entries: A set of leather strips, with embedded sharp spikes, to be tightly bound around foot or hand, which protect the knuckles or foot and transforms mere punches or kicks into lethal stabs.

baseitem.name: Bladed Cestus
entries: A set of leather strips, with an embedded sharp blade, to be tightly bound around foot or hand, which protect the knuckles or foot and transforms mere punches or kicks into lethal lacerations.
